## D

<details> --------------------------------------------
<summary>dateadd</summary>
     
DATEADD (datepart , number , date ) 	
[Docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/functions/dateadd-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver15)		
	
**Notes**
* Here is how you truncate the month
```
select dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()),0)
```
	* This works because it finds the difference in months from 0 (1900/1/1) and adds back that same amount of months
	
</details>
